sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const universities = [ { name: 'Sardar Patel University, Mandi', description: 'A state university providing quality education in various technical and non-technical domains.', website: 'https://spumandi.ac.in', route: '/departments' }, { name: 'Himachal Pradesh University', description: 'Renowned university offering UG and PG courses with strong research programs.', website: 'https://hpuniv.ac.in', route: '/departments' }, { name: 'IIT Mandi', description: 'An Institute of National Importance offering cutting-edge research and engineering programs.', website: 'https://iitmandi.ac.in', route: '/departments' }, { name: 'NIT Hamirpur', description: 'Premier technical institution offering UG, PG and doctoral programs in engineering, architecture, and sciences.', website: 'https://nith.ac.in', route: '/departments' }, { name: 'Central University of Himachal Pradesh', description: 'A central university providing a variety of UG, PG, and PhD programs.', website: 'https://cuhimachal.ac.in', route: '/departments' } ];

University Details

{universities.map((uni, index) => (

{uni.name}

{uni.description}

Visit Website
))}
